tender.title: Wire bonder

classification.description: Laboratory, optical and precision equipments (excl. glasses)

tender.description:
Cardiff University has a clean room situated within the Institute For Compound
Semiconductors (ICS Clean room). The cleanroom has recently undergone some extensive
refurbishment works and will see further improvements when it moves into the new Translational
Research Hub. In preparation of the move the University is reviewing its equipment
requirements for the facility.
Therefore, Cardiff University is looking for a new wire bonder tool to generate electrical
interconnections between processed devices and readout infrastructures (chip headers, PCBs
etc). The University encourages bids from suppliers that have experience of supplying wire
bonders to organisations of a similar nature.

lots.description:

Therefore, Cardiff University is looking for a new wire bonder tool to generate electrical
interconnections between processed devices and readout infrastructures (chip headers, PCBs
etc). The University encourages bids from suppliers that have experience of supplying wire
bonders to organisations of a similar nature. Additional information: dfgfghjhjh
